trans-unit.source: Representation of the Win32_DiskDrive class.
trans-unit.target: Win32_DiskDrive类的表示。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Cloud SQL instance. Cloud SQL instances are SQL databases hosted in Google’s cloud. The Instances resource provides methods for common configuration and management tasks.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个Cloud SQL实例。Cloud SQL实例是托管在Google云中的SQL数据库。实例资源提供了用于常见配置和管理任务的方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents a GCP Project. A project is a container for ACLs, APIs, App Engine Apps, VMs, and other Google Cloud Platform resources.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个 GCP 项目。项目是ACL、API、App Engine应用程序、虚拟机和其他Google Cloud Platform资源的容器。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Global Address resource. Global addresses are used for HTTP(S) load balancing.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个全局地址资源。全局地址用于HTTP(S)负载均衡。

trans-unit.source: Represents a GlobalForwardingRule resource. Global forwarding rules are used to forward traffic to the correct load balancer for HTTP load balancing. Global forwarding rules can only be used for HTTP load balancing.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个GlobalForwardingRule资源。全局转发规则用于将流量转发到正确的负载均衡器以实现 HTTP 负载均衡。全局转发规则只能用于 HTTP 负载均衡。

trans-unit.source: Represents a NodeGroup resource to manage a group of sole-tenant nodes.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个 NodeGroup 资源,用于管理一组独租节点。

trans-unit.source: Represents a NodeTemplate resource. Node templates specify properties for creating sole-tenant nodes, such as node type, vCPU and memory requirements, node affinity labels, and region.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个 NodeTemplate 资源。节点模板指定了创建独租户节点的属性,如节点类型、vCPU和内存要求、节点亲和力标签和区域。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Persistent Disk Snapshot resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个持久性磁盘快照资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents a RegionTargetHttpProxy resource, which is used by one or more forwarding rules to route incoming HTTP requests to a URL map.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个RegionTargetHttpProxy资源,该资源被一个或多个转发规则用于将传入的HTTP请求路由到URL映射。

trans-unit.source: Represents a RegionTargetHttpsProxy resource, which is used by one or more forwarding rules to route incoming HTTPS requests to a URL map.
trans-unit.target: 代表RegionTargetHttpsProxy资源,该资源被一个或多个转发规则用于将传入的HTTPS请求路由到URL映射。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Route resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表路由资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents a Router resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个Router资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents a SMN notification topic resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个SMN通知主题资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents a SQL database inside the Cloud SQL instance, hosted in Google’s cloud.
trans-unit.target: 表示托管在Google的云中的Cloud SQL实例内部的SQL数据库。

trans-unit.source: Represents a SSL policy. SSL policies give you the ability to control the features of SSL that your SSL proxy or HTTPS load balancer negotiates.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个SSL策略。SSL策略使您能够控制SSL代理或HTTPS负载平衡器协商的SSL功能。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetHttpProxy resource, which is used by one or more global forwarding rule to route incoming HTTP requests to a URL map.
trans-unit.target: 代表TargetHttpProxy资源,该资源被一个或多个全局转发规则用于将传入的HTTP请求路由到URL映射。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetHttpsProxy resource, which is used by one or more global forwarding rule to route incoming HTTPS requests to a URL map.
trans-unit.target: 代表 TargetHttpsProxy 资源,该资源被一个或多个全局转发规则用于将传入的 HTTPS 请求路由到 URL 地图。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetInstance resource which defines an endpoint instance that terminates traffic of certain protocols. In particular, they are used in Protocol Forwarding, where forwarding rules can send packets to a non-NAT’ed target instance. Each target instance contains a single virtual machine instance that receives and handles traffic from the corresponding forwarding rules.
trans-unit.target: 表示TargetInstance资源，该资源定义了终结某些协议的流量的终结点实例。特别是，它们用于协议转发中，其中转发规则可以将数据包发送到非NAT目标目标实例。每个目标实例都包含一个虚拟机实例，该实例接收并处理来自相应转发规则的流量。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetPool resource, used for Load Balancing.
trans-unit.target: 代表 TargetPool 资源,用于负载均衡。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetSslProxy resource, which is used by one or more global forwarding rule to route incoming SSL requests to a backend service.
trans-unit.target: 代表 TargetSslProxy 资源,该资源被一个或多个全局转发规则用于将传入的 SSL 请求路由到后端服务。

trans-unit.source: Represents a TargetTcpProxy resource, which is used by one or more global forwarding rule to route incoming TCP requests to a Backend service.
trans-unit.target: 代表 TargetTcpProxy 资源,该资源被一个或多个全局转发规则用于将传入的 TCP 请求路由到后端服务。

trans-unit.source: Represents a VPN gateway managed outside of GCP.
trans-unit.target: 代表在GCP之外管理的VPN网关。

trans-unit.source: Represents a VPN gateway running in GCP. This virtual device is managed by Google, but used only by you.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个在GCP中运行的VPN网关。这个虚拟设备由Google管理,但只由你使用。

trans-unit.source: Represents a cloud-init NoCloud user-data source. The NoCloud data will be added as a disk to the virtual machine. A proper cloud-init installation is required inside the guest. More information https://kubevirt.io/api-reference/master/definitions.html#_v1_cloudinitnocloudsource
trans-unit.target: 表示一个cloud-init NoCloud用户数据源。NoCloud数据将作为磁盘添加到虚拟机。来宾内部需要正确的cloud-init安装。更多信息https://kubevirt.io/api-reference/master/definitions.html#_v1_cloudinitnocloudsource

trans-unit.source: Represents a machine learning solution.
trans-unit.target: 代表着机器学习的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Represents a reservation resource. A reservation ensures that capacity is held in a specific zone even if the reserved VMs are not running.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个预订资源。即使被保留的虚拟机没有运行,保留也能确保在特定区域内保持容量。

trans-unit.source: Represents an Address resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表地址资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents an Autoscaler resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个Autoscaler资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents an Image resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个图像资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents an Instance Group resource. Instance groups are self-managed and can contain identical or different instances. Instance groups do not use an instance template. Unlike managed instance groups, you must create and add instances to an instance group manually.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个实例组资源。实例组是自我管理的,可以包含相同或不同的实例。实例组不使用实例模板。与管理的实例组不同,您必须手动创建并向实例组添加实例。

trans-unit.source: Represents an InterconnectAttachment (VLAN attachment) resource. For more information, see Creating VLAN Attachments.
trans-unit.target: 代表 InterconnectAttachment(VLAN 附件)资源。有关更多信息,请参见创建 VLAN 附件。

trans-unit.source: Represents an SSL certificate created for a Cloud SQL instance. To use the SSL certificate you must have the SSL Client Certificate and the associated SSL Client Key. The Client Key can be downloaded only when the SSL certificate is created with the insert method.
trans-unit.target: 代表为 Cloud SQL 实例创建的 SSL 证书。要使用 SSL 证书,您必须拥有 SSL 客户证书和相关联的 SSL 客户密钥。只有在使用插入方法创建SSL证书时,才能下载客户密钥。

trans-unit.source: Represents an vpc resource.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个vpc资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents the REST resource this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 代表这个对象所代表的REST资源。

trans-unit.source: Represents the target relay servers ownership.
trans-unit.target: 表示目标中继服务器的所有权。

trans-unit.source: Reputation level of the Internet Service.
trans-unit.target: 互联网服务的信誉等级。

trans-unit.source: Request a reload of Memset’s DNS infrastructure, and optionally poll until it finishes.
trans-unit.target: 请求重新加载Memset的DNS基础结构，并可以选择轮询直到完成。

trans-unit.source: Request an Amazon-provided IPv6 CIDR block with /56 prefix length. You cannot specify the range of IPv6 addresses, or the size of the CIDR block.
trans-unit.target: 请求使用/56前缀长度的Amazon提供的IPv6 CIDR块。您不能指定IPv6地址的范围或CIDR块的大小。

trans-unit.target: 请求主体(如果需要)。应该是序列化的json字符串。

trans-unit.target: 请求协议:

trans-unit.source: Request specific fields from subset. '*' to return all the fields, one or more subsets are allowed. '<list of fields>' to return specified fields, only one subset will be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 从子集中请求特定字段。'*'返回所有字段，允许一个或多个子集。“ <字段列表>”返回指定的字段，仅允许一个子集。

trans-unit.source: Request timeout in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 请求超时,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Request validation or re-validation of a domain with the Entrust Certificate Services (ECS) API.
trans-unit.target: 使用Entrust Certificate Services (ECS)API请求验证或重新验证一个域。

trans-unit.source: Requested actions were successfully performed on all devices.
trans-unit.target: 所有设备上都成功执行了所请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: Requested disk size for the VM that runs the build. Note that this is NOT "disk free"; some of the space will be used by the operating system and build utilities.
trans-unit.target: 运行构建的虚拟机所要求的磁盘大小。请注意,这不是 "磁盘空闲";部分空间将被操作系统和构建实用程序使用。

trans-unit.target: 要求的可核查性选项:

trans-unit.source: Requests Ironic to set a node into inspect state in order to collect metadata regarding the node. This command may be out of band or in-band depending on the ironic driver configuration. This is only possible on nodes in ‘manageable’ and ‘available’ state.
trans-unit.target: 请求Ironic将节点设置为检查状态，以便收集有关该节点的元数据。此命令可能是带外的还是带内的，具体取决于讽刺驱动程序的配置。这仅在处于“可管理”和“可用”状态的节点上才有可能。

trans-unit.source: Require HTTPS and validate certificates when pulling or pushing. Also used during build if a pull or push is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 在拉取或推送时需要HTTPS和验证证书。如果需要拉取或推送,也可以在构建过程中使用。

trans-unit.source: Require a client certificate and authenticate it with the peer/peergrp.

trans-unit.target: 要求在密码中使用小写字母。

trans-unit.target: 要求在密码中加入数字。

trans-unit.target: 要求在密码中使用大写字母。

trans-unit.source: Require valid SSL certificates (set to `false` if you'd like to use self-signed certificates)
trans-unit.target: 要求有效的SSL证书(如果你想使用自签名证书,则设置为 "false")。

trans-unit.target: 在command = create时需要。

trans-unit.target: present 状态所必需。

trans-unit.source: Rescue blocks specify tasks to run when an earlier task in a block fails. This approach is similar to exception handling in many programming languages. Ansible only runs rescue blocks after a task returns a ‘failed’ state. Bad task definitions and unreachable hosts will not trigger the rescue block.
trans-unit.target: 救援块指定当块中的较早任务失败时要运行的任务。这种方法类似于许多编程语言中的异常处理。Ansible仅在任务返回“失败”状态后运行救援块。错误的任务定义和不可达的主机将不会触发救援块。

trans-unit.source: Response time threshold, specified as a percentage of the Response Time-out parameter. If the response to a monitor probe has not arrived when the threshold is reached, the appliance generates an SNMP trap called monRespTimeoutAboveThresh. After the response time returns to a value below the threshold, the appliance generates a monRespTimeoutBelowThresh SNMP trap. For the traps to be generated, the "MONITOR-RTO-THRESHOLD" alarm must also be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 响应时间阈值,指定为响应时间-out参数的百分比。如果在达到阈值时,对监控探头的响应还没有到达,则设备会生成名为monRespTimeoutAboveThresh的SNMP trap。在响应时间返回到阈值以下的值后,设备会生成一个名为monRespTimeoutBelowThresh的SNMP陷阱。要生成陷阱,还必须启用 "MONITOR-RTO-THRESHOLD "报警。

trans-unit.source: Restart policy to follow when containers exit. Restart policy will not take effect if a container is stopped via the podman kill or podman stop commands. Valid values are * no - Do not restart containers on exit * on-failure[:max_retries] - Restart containers when they exit with a non-0 exit code, retrying indefinitely or until the optional max_retries count is hit * always - Restart containers when they exit, regardless of status, retrying indefinitely
trans-unit.target: 容器退出时要遵循的重启策略。如果通过podman kill或podman stop命令停止容器,重启策略将不生效。有效值是*no-容器退出时不重启*on-failure[:max_retries]-容器退出时退出代码为非0时重启,无限期重试或直到达到可选的max_retries次数*always-容器退出时重启,无论状态如何,无限期重试。

trans-unit.source: Return values out and err have been deprecated and will be removed in community.general 3.0.0. Use stdout and stderr instead.

trans-unit.source: Return values contain customer_gateway and customer_gateways keys which are identical dicts. You should use customer_gateway. See https://github.com/ansible/ansible-modules-extras/issues/2773 for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回值包含customer_gateway和customer_gateways键，它们是相同的字典。您应该使用customer_gateway。有关详细信息，请参见https://github.com/ansible/ansible-modules-extras/issues/2773。

trans-unit.source: Return values may include, high-speed, cdg, chd, none, cubic, illinois, new-reno, reno, scalable, vegas, westwood, and woodside.

trans-unit.source: Returns "info"
trans-unit.target: 返回 "信息"

trans-unit.source: Returns GET requests from the Ansible Tower API. See https://docs.ansible.com/ansible-tower/latest/html/towerapi/index.html for API usage.
trans-unit.target: 从Ansible Tower API返回GET请求。有关API的用法，请参见https://docs.ansible.com/ansible-tower/latest/html/towerapi/index.html。

trans-unit.source: Returns a boolean when attribute is check_ec2_classic. Otherwise returns the value(s) of the attribute (or all attributes if one is not specified).
trans-unit.target: 当属性为check_ec2_classic 时，返回一个布尔值。否则，返回属性的值（如果未指定，则返回所有属性）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary for every extension OID
trans-unit.target: 返回每个扩展OID的字典

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of complex objects representing the containers
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表容器的复合对象列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of strings; for each template in the list of templates you pass in, returns a string containing the results of processing that template.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串列表;对于传入的模板列表中的每个模板,返回一个包含该模板处理结果的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a native string that labels the platform (“Linux”, “Solaris”, etc). Currently, this is the result of calling platform.system().
trans-unit.target: 返回标记平台的本地字符串（“ Linux”，“ Solaris”等）。当前，这是调用 platform.system() 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a parsesable dictionary instead of raw XML output
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可解析的字典,而不是原始的XML输出。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string based on criteria which represents an rrule
trans-unit.target: 返回一个基于标准的字符串,代表一个规则。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string list of paths joined by commas, or an empty list if no files match. For a ‘true list’ pass wantlist=True to the lookup.
trans-unit.target: 返回用逗号连接的路径的字符串列表，如果没有文件匹配，则返回空列表。对于“真实列表”，请通过 wantlist=True 进行查找。

trans-unit.source: Returns a summary of all distributions, streaming distributions and origin_access_identities.
trans-unit.target: Returns a summary of all distributions,streaming distributions and origin_access_identities.

trans-unit.source: Returns a summary of all distributions, streaming distributions and origin_access_identities. This is the default behaviour if no option is selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有分发、流媒体分发和起源_访问身份的摘要。如果没有选择选项,这是默认的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple containing (True, selinux_context) if the given path is on a NFS or other ‘special’ fs mount point, otherwise the return will be (False, None).
trans-unit.target: 如果给定路径位于NFS或其他“特殊” fs挂载点上，则返回包含（True，selinux_context）的元组，否则返回为（False，None）。

trans-unit.target: 成功时返回附加信息。

trans-unit.target: 返回 vSphere 存储配置文件的基本信息。

trans-unit.target: 返回事实“ ec2_elbs”，如果state = absent作为参数传递，则它是附加到实例的Elb的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about a Windows file.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Windows文件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about certificates in a Windows Certificate Store.
trans-unit.target: 返回Windows证书库中的证书信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the load balancer.
trans-unit.target: 返回负载均衡器的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the specified cache cluster.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的缓存集群的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the specified snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 返回关于指定快照的信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns list of matching Launch Configurations for a given name, along with other useful information
trans-unit.target: 返回给定名称的匹配发射配置列表,以及其他有用信息。

trans-unit.target: 返回给定名称的匹配发射配置列表,以及其他有用信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns lists of swarm objects names for the services - nodes, services, tasks.
trans-unit.target: Returns lists of swarm objects names for the services-nodes,services,tasks.
